entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or flurries changing to periods of snow this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
